archiefmat.titel: Court of Policy and Court of Civil and Criminal Justice: proceedings
archiefmat.titel_eng: Court of Policy and Court of Civil and Criminal Justice: proceedings
archiefmat.scope: Essequibo 1735-1787. Demerara pre-1776-1789. Essequibo and Demerara combined 1774-1807 in Stabroek. Berbice 1745-1809, which also includes volumes with petitions to the court. Minutes touch regularly on matters of multicultural society, amongst others the manumission of slaves.
archiefmat.notes: Essequibo 1735-1787. Demerara pre 1776-1789. Essequibo and Demerara combined 1774-1807. Berbice 1745-1809.
